02-13-2012, 11:41 AM #1 katland View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Oct 2006 Posts 16,928 free tote bag w/Food Network mag subscription www.tote.foodnetworkmag.com
free tote bag with paid order, while supplies last
Each term includes the features of the Continuous Service Program* 1 year for just $15 SAVE 62%! 2 years for just $25 SAVE 69% Best Deal!
*Continuous Service Program: I understand that unless I tell you otherwise I will receive uninterrupted service and delivery of Food Network Magazine, and my subscription will be automatically renewed at the end of each subscription term, at the rate then in effect and I authorize Food Network Magazine to charge the credit/debit card I have provided. I won't be bothered with any renewal notices in the mail; instead I will receive a clearly marked reminder notice with the then current rate at least 45 days before my credit card is charged. I may opt out of the automatic renewal at any time by contacting customer service. Reply With Quote
